EDIT.SCRIPT: local cust = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then UISelf:SetEditFocus(true) UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end
EDIT.HOTKEY: local kName = UISelf:GetEditText() if 0 ~= kName:Length() then Send_PreCreateGuild(kName) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() local kEdit = kParent:GetControl("EDT_NAME") local kName = kEdit:GetEditText() if 0 ~= kName:Length() then Send_PreCreateGuild(kName) end

local kSelf = UISelf local kSelectedWnd = kSelf:GetParent():GetControl("IMG_OVER1") if not kSelectedWnd:IsNil() then kSelectedWnd:SetLocation( kSelf:GetLocation() ) kSelectedWnd:Visible(true) end SetTempGuildEmblem( kSelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() )
if 0 > GetTempGuildEmblem() then AddWarnDataTT(400838) return true end local kSelf = UISelf CallNpcFunctionUI(105, kSelf:GetParent():GetOwnerGuid(), "Elvis_normal", 400548);
BUTTON.HOTKEY: if 0 > GetTempGuildEmblem() then AddWarnDataTT(400838) return true end local kSelf = UISelf CallNpcFunctionUI(105, kSelf:GetParent():GetOwnerGuid(), "Elvis_normal", 400548); return true
local kSelf = UISelf OnCommonTalkMenuCommand(0, kSelf:GetParent():GetOwnerGuid()) return true

IMG.SCRIPT: local slf = UISelf local scenario = slf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_BG_SET_SCENARIO") local pPos = scenario:GetLocation() pPos:SetX(pPos:GetX()-105) slf:SetLocation(pPos)
local slf = UISelf local scenario = slf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_BG_SET_SCENARIO") local pPos = scenario:GetLocation() pPos:SetX(pPos:GetX()+scenario:GetSize():GetX()) slf:SetLocation(pPos)

FORM.SCRIPT: if KeyIsDown(42, true) or KeyIsDown(54, true) or g_EnableSkipButton then if not GetQuestMan():IsMenuDialog() then QuestNextDialog(UISelf) else g_EnableSkipButton = false end end
FORM.HOTKEY: if IsCanCancelFullScreenQuestDialog() then SendReqCloseDialog() return true end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() if nil ~= kParent and not kParent:IsNil() then local kTrgLoc = kParent:GetCustomDataAsStr() local kPC = g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilot() if nil ~= kPC and not kPC:IsNil() then local kActor = kPC:GetActor() if nil ~= kActor and not kActor:IsNil() then if nil ~= kTrgLoc and not kTrgLoc:IsNil() then if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end local kTargetPos = g_world:GetObjectPosByName(kTrgLoc:GetStr()) if nil ~= kTargetPos and not kTargetPos:IsZero() then local kAction = kActor:ReserveTransitAction("a_teleport") kAction:SetParamAsPoint(1, kTargetPos) end end end end end CloseUI("FRM_TUTORIAL_SKIP_POS")

FORM.SCRIPT: for i = 0, 7 do local kParent = UISelf:GetParent() if not kParent:IsNil() then local kBuildFrm = kParent:GetControl("FRM_WANTED_QUEST_ITEM" .. i) if not kBuildFrm:IsNil() then local kSelect = kBuildFrm:GetControl("IMG_SELECT") if not kSelect:IsNil() then kSelect:SetUVIndex(1) end end end end local kSelect = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_WANTED_QUEST_ITEM0") kSelect:GetControl("IMG_SELECT"):SetUVIndex(3)

SelectWantedQuest( UISelf ) for i = 0, 7 do local kParent = UISelf:GetParent() if not kParent:IsNil() then local kBuildFrm = kParent:GetControl("FRM_WANTED_QUEST_ITEM" .. i) if not kBuildFrm:IsNil() then local kSelect = kBuildFrm:GetControl("IMG_SELECT") if not kSelect:IsNil() then if UISelf:GetBuildIndex() == i then kSelect:SetUVIndex(3) else kSelect:SetUVIndex(1) end end end end end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() if not kParent:IsNil() then kParent:ReLocationSnapChild() end CloseUI("SFRM_QUEST_QUICK_INFO")
local kSelf = UISelf local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() local kPopDrop = kParent:GetControl("SFRM_ITEM_CLASS_DROP") if not kPopDrop:IsNil() then kPopDrop:Visible( not kPopDrop:IsVisible() ) end
local kSelf = UISelf local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() local kPopDrop = kParent:GetControl("SFRM_ITEM_CLASS_DROP") if not kPopDrop:IsNil() then kPopDrop:Visible( not kPopDrop:IsVisible() ) end
local kSelf = UISelf SetSoulStoneTradeLocation(1) UpdateSoulStoneTrade() kSelf:GetParent():Visible(false)
local kSelf = UISelf SetSoulStoneTradeLocation(2) UpdateSoulStoneTrade() kSelf:GetParent():Visible(false)
if true == UISelf:IsGrayScale() then CallToolTipText(0, GetTextW(75005), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation()) else CallToolTipText(0, GetTextW(75006), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation()) end
if false == UISelf:IsGrayScale() then GetQuestMan():RemoteAcceptQuest(UISelf) end

FORM.SCRIPT: if UISelf:GetBuildIndex() == 0 then UISelf:SetUVIndex(3) else UISelf:SetUVIndex(1) end
if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end g_world:SetShowWorldFocusFilter(true, "../Data/5_Effect/9_Tex/EF_blackBG.tga", 0.3)
if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end g_world:SetShowWorldFocusFilter(false, "../Data/5_Effect/9_Tex/EF_blackBG.tga", 0.4)
